content: 3 sl1* repeat to end of round 88 100 sts round 11 style a *k2tog k1 sl1 k3 sl1* repeat to end of round style b *k4 sl1* repeat to end of round 77 100 sts round 13 style a *k2 sl1 k2tog k1 sl1* repeat to end of round style b *k2tog k2 sl1 k4 sl1* repeat to end of round 66 90 sts round 15 style a *k2tog sl1 k2 sl1* repeat to end of round style b *k3 sl1 k4 sl1* repeat to end of round 55 90 sts round 17 style a *k1 sl1 k2tog sl1* repeat to end of round style b *k3 sl1 k2tog k2 sl1* repeat to end of round 44 80 sts round 19 style a *k2tog k1 sl1* repeat to end of round style b *k2tog k1 sl1 k3 sl1* repeat to end of round 33 70 sts round 21 style a *sl1 k2tog* repeat to end of round style b *k2 sl1 k2tog k1 sl1* repeat to end of round 22 60 sts round 22 style a *k2tog* repeat to end of round style b knit 11 60 sts round 23 style a *k2tog* repeat to last st k1 style b *k2tog sl1 k2 sl1* repeat to end of round 6 50 sts style a thread tail through remaining sts pull tightly and weave in ends style b round 24 knit round 25 *k1 sl1 k2tog sl1* repeat to end of round 40 sts round 26 knit round 27 *k2tog k1 sl1* repeat to end of round 30 sts round 28 k2tog repeat to end of round 15 sts round 29 k2tog repeat to last stitch k1 8 sts thread tail through remaining sts pull tightly and weave in ends abbreviations version b version a co - cast on pm place marker k knit round round designating a row when you are knitting in the k2tog knit 2 stitches together round on a circular needle kfb knit in front and back of stitch sl - slip p - purl sts stitches stitch glossary k1 p1 rib with yarn in back *knit 1 stitch bring yarn to front under the right hand needle and purl the next stitch bring yarn to back under the right hand needle* repeat between ** to create the rib pattern k2 decrease insert right hand needle from front to back through the 2nd stitch and the 1st stitch on the left hand needle and knit them together kfb - insert right hand needle into front of stitch as if to knit bring yarn around and pull the stitch through but do not remove the stitch from the left hand needle insert right hand needle into back of the same stitch and wrap yarn around from back to front and bring that stitch through and slide stitch off left hand needle ©copyright 2013 sarah montie handknits po box 178 ih nj 08732 www sarahmontie com info@sarahmontie com this pattern may not be photocopied or reproduced without written
